EmailTemplate.subject: {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Apttus_Proposal__Proposal_Name__c}

Dear {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Budget_Checked_Out_By__c},
You currently have the budget opened and locked for {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Apttus_Proposal__Proposal_Name__c} for budget changes. Please ensure that you have Saved & Attached your working budget. If you still require to make budget changes please ignore this email.
Thank You
